comments: Bogdanovic (IND) briefly slides his arm around Jordan (NYK) as they disengage from the pick.
Jordan (NYK) is firming up in legal position during the pick with Bogdanovic (IND).
Smith Jr. (NYK) makes marginal contact with Collison (IND) on the perimeter that does not affect his ability to maintain control of the ball.
RLB shows Vonleh (NYK) moves laterally and makes body contact that affects Collison's (IND) ability to gather the ball at the end of his drive.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: RLB shows Collison (IND) last makes contact with the ball prior to the ball making contact with the baseline.
